snippet.title: Bump in the Night Trailer Demo out March 15 #bitn
snippet.description:
Bump in the Night is a single player game where strategy meets psychological horror. Confined to one room, you'll use cameras and commands to direct NPC investigators and collect evidence. Each environment offers unique challenges and frights. Can you survive what goes bump in the night?

#gameplay #trailer #bitn #bumpinthenight #steam #gamedemos 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2819300/Bump_in_the_Night/?utm_source=youtube
